Method Detail

parse

public static Node parse(java.util.List<Token> tokens,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Symbol> symbolMapper,
                         java.lang.String topLevel)
                  throws ParserException
Parse the input list of tokens.

Parameters:
tokens - The list of tokens to be parsed.
symbolMapper - Map that maps symbol textual name into actual symbol.
topLevel - Name of the symbol that is supposed to be the root of the parse tree.
Returns:
Root node of parse tree.
Throws:
ParserException - Exception is thrown if given symbol cannot be found or if parsing error occurs.

ParserException
